name: ratelimiter-microservices
description: Rate Limiter System with API Gateway and Redis built with Microservices architecture

scripts.dev: concurrently --names "Backend,RateLimiter,Gateway,Analytics,Admin" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgYellow.bold,bgCyan.bold" "cd backend-service && npm start" "cd rate-limiter-service && npm start" "cd api-gateway-service && npm start" "cd usage-analytics-service && npm start" "cd admin-service && npm start"

author: Shaikh
